room: Dence forest covered in a heavy fog
items: a map that has been drawn on with red dye leading to a town labbled Jerico

room: at the end of the path there is a rey of light as the trees start to clear up
characters: I see you made it outta there, youngin
events: (rey still doesn’t respond to the man's polite gesture, instead giving him a distrustful stare like he’s waiting for him to try something)
Well, where are you coming from, youngin?
(Rey, walks past the man to an outlook squinting his eyes against the beaming sun to get a look of a seemingly small yet populated town)
Now that down there is Jericho
(At this point, the old-man’s suspicion has reached its peak)
Tell me, really, who are you?
(Rey thinks of what to say to this stranger, what if he's an enemy waiting for me to drop my guard, or even worse, a monster posing as an Old-Man)
So tell me a little about yourself then
(Rey seems to put back on his quiet nature)
Well, you seem hungry; why don't you come down to my humble home and have a bite to eat?
(I could be a bandit or even a monster, Rey questions the old man)
You don’t seem like a monster, or at least look like one?
(Rey starts to get irritated at the fact that the old man won't leave him alone, Or you could be the monster luring me back to eat me!)
Well now I'm just being polite here. True I don't know you, youngin, but that doesn't make a difference; you're living, aren’t you? You must eat
(Rey sighs and gives into the old man’s politeness)
you and the old man are on the way to the town of jericho
